name: Web of All That's Come Before
flavor: Threads you've been weaving through your adventures create a vibrant, pearlescent web.

metadata.file_basename: Web of All Thats Come Before
metadata.flavor: Threads you've been weaving through your adventures create a vibrant, pearlescent web.
metadata.item_name: Web of All That's Come Before (9 Essence)

effects.tier1: 2 corruption damage; A < WEAK, restrained (save ends)
effects.tier2: 3 corruption damage; A < AVERAGE, restrained (save ends)
effects.tier3: 5 corruption damage; A < STRONG, restrained (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The area is difficult terrain until the start of your next turn. Each enemy who ends their turn in the area is restrained (save ends).

effects.name: Persistent 1
effects.effect: The area remains until the start of your next turn.
